00045      PVDescription(const PVDescription& p)
00046           : mName(p.mName), mType(p.mType), mCategory(p.mCategory), mFactions(p.mFactions), mMin(p.mMin), mMax(p.mMax), mVisible(p.mVisible) {}
00047 
00053      bool visible() const { return mVisible; }
00054 
00061      bool operator < (const PVDescription& p) { return mName < p.mName; }
